alphaLabel.description_zh: Alpha 滑块 aria-label 属性

focusable.description: Determines whether interactive elements (sliders thumbs and swatches) should be focusable, true by default
focusable.description_zh: 确定交互式元素（滑块、缩略图和色板）是否应可聚焦，默认情况下为 true

fullWidth.description: Determines whether the component should take 100% width of its container, false by default
fullWidth.description_zh: 确定组件是否应占用其容器的 100% 宽度，默认为 false

onChangeEnd.description: Called when the user stops dragging one of the sliders or changes the value with arrow keys
onChangeEnd.description_zh: 当用户停止拖动其中一个滑块或使用箭头键更改值时调用

onColorSwatchClick.description: Called when one of the color swatches is clicked
onColorSwatchClick.description_zh: 单击其中一个色板时调用

saturationLabel.description_zh: 饱和度滑块 aria-label 属性

size.description: Controls size of hue, alpha and saturation sliders, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制色相、alpha 和饱和度滑块的大小，默认为 'md'

swatches.description: An array of colors in one of the supported formats. Used to render swatches list below the color picker.
swatches.description_zh: 采用受支持格式之一的颜色数组。用于渲染颜色选取器下方的色板列表。

swatchesPerRow.description: Number of swatches per row, 7 by default
swatchesPerRow.description_zh: 每行的色板数，默认为 7 个

withPicker.description: Determines whether the color picker should be displayed, true by default
withPicker.description_zh: 确定是否应显示颜色选取器，默认为 true
